entry.title: TikTok and the Fall of the Social-Media Giants
entry.quote: Facebook is trying to copy TikTok, but this strategy may well signal the end of these legacy platforms.

entry.title: ‘The entire protein universe’: AI predicts shape of nearly every known protein
entry.quote: DeepMind’s AlphaFold tool has determined the structures of around 200 million proteins.

entry.title: How far can you go by train in 5h?
entry.quote: This map shows you how far you can travel from each station in Europe in less than 5 hours.

entry.title: MIT, Autodesk develop AI that can figure out confusing Lego instructions
entry.quote: But can it build my Ikea dresser?

entry.title: GFP-GAN is a New Free AI Tool That Can Fix Most Old Photos Instantly
entry.quote: Anyone who has old photographs of their families and friends that have not held up well against time, regardless of the small and/or poor condition of the image, now has the chance to restore their faded and cracked images, returning them to their original state, or even better.
